alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Carter; Northern Big Horn; Powder River; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 3:58AM MST until February 22 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow, possibly heavy at times. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southeast Montana. Portions of north central Wyoming. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 6 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to slick and snowpacked roads with reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall is expected tonight into early Monday. Expect wind chills below zero by Monday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
